notes: Upscale modern apartment with high-end finishes including marble accent walls, recessed lighting, wood flooring, and custom built-in shelving. The kitchen features a gas stove, modern white cabinetry, and ample counter space. Baby safety concerns include a raised platform step in the living room and the balcony; the floor-to-ceiling windows have railings but balcony access needs childproofing. Excellent natural light from large windows, very clean condition.
